sentences.sContent: Ferraro was the first woman to be nominated for the job of vice president.
sentences.sCn: 费拉罗是第一位获得副总统职位提名的女性。

sentences.sContent: Next year Mr Jenks will retire and Mr Broadbent will be nominated as his replacement.
sentences.sCn: 明年詹克斯先生退休，布罗德本特先生将获任命接替他的职位。

exam.question: Bill Gates and Walt Disney are two people America has ______ to be the Greatest American.

answer.explain: 比尔·盖茨和沃尔特·迪斯尼被提名为两个最伟大的美国人。appoint： 约定， 指定； appease： 平息； nickname： 给…起绰号。

words.tran: 主格的；记名的；被提名的
被任命者；被提名的人；代名人

trans.tranOther: to officially suggest someone or something for an important position, duty, or prize
